description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 24 April 2023 at 14:00 EDT. Canada is seeking interested colleges, universities or similar organizations who are interested in providing temporary dormitory style accommodations (separate rooms, cafeteria, etc.) with related services to asylum claimants for the Department of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC).
duration_in_months: Just a quick overview of this contract
